ObjectClass.Name: Reaph
ObjectClass.Description:
REAPH:
Defensive support building
Repairs shields of nearby units [Repair rate: 2 hp/s, R: 24] Can move itself

Objective.Name: Clear Status and Nanite
Objective.Details: \Removes Status effects and Nanites\ from the target

Objective.Name: Chronobomb
Objective.Details: \Launch a missile that will\send all units in the target area\into the future\Max flight range: 375 spaces

Objective.Name: Plasma Bomb
Objective.Details: \Launch a plasma warhead\cruise missile that chronoports back\in time en route to the target\Max flight range: 300 spaces

Objective.Name: ChronoBomb
Objective.Details: \Launch a missile that will\send all units in the target area\into the future\Max flight range: 375 spaces
